mapper.update: update tbl_user set deptId = #{deptid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, realName = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expireTime = #{expiretime,jdbcType=CHAR}, lockStatus = #{lockstatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, allowIps = #{allowips,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orderId = #{orderid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, timestamp = #{timestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, deptId, username, realName, password, email, expireTime, lockStatus, allowIps, orderId, timestamp, status from tbl_user where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, deptId, username, realName, password, email, expireTime, lockStatus, allowIps, orderId, timestamp, status from tbl_user
